function.name: urlencodedformat
function.help: Generates a URL-encoded string. For example, it replaces spaces with %20, and non-alphanumeric characters with equivalent hexadecimal escape sequences. Passes arbitrary strings within a URL.

parameter.name: String
parameter.help: A string or a variable that contains one

parameter.name: charset
parameter.help: The character encoding in which the string is encoded.
